Header.title: Welcome to PlaceAI
Header.paragraph: PlaceAI is an intelligent, AI-powered platform designed to revolutionize student shortlisting for campus placements. Using advanced machine learning techniques, including the attention mechanism, we provide accurate predictions to help placement officers make informed decisions effortlessly.

About.paragraph: We are the Computer Engineers from Pimpri Chinchwad College of Engineering and Research, Our aim is not make the placements criteria more robust, transparent and accurate to the students and proffesors.

Features.title: AI-Powered Placement Prediction üéØ
Features.text: Utilizes advanced machine learning models with the attention mechanism to predict students' chances of getting placed based on academic records, skills, and other relevant factors.

Features.title: Student Shortlisting & Ranking üìä
Features.text: Automatically shortlists and ranks students based on their placement probability, helping placement officers make data-driven decisions efficiently.

Features.title: Customizable Criteria & Filters ‚öôÔ∏è
Features.text: Placement officers can set custom filters such as CGPA, skill sets, internships, and certifications to tailor shortlisting based on company-specific requirements.

Features.title: Real-Time Analytics & Insights üìà
Features.text: Provides interactive dashboards and reports with visual insights on student placement trends, strengths, and areas for improvement.
